body:
Just went through the output of git log vs CONTRIBUTORS. All the missing emails are below, but nearly all are not really missing. The only new one seems to be asmaloney@gmail.com, which we should add, and then I think we can call this done.

andybons@gmail.com - already as andybons@chromium.org
asmaloney@gmail.com - new?
brad@danga.com - bradfitz
bwk@research.att.com - ancient
dbort@golang.org - ancient
devnull@localhost - ancient
dominik@honnef.co - already as dominik.honnef@gmail.com
lahosken@gmail.com - already as lahosken@golang.org
michael.hudson@canonical.com - already as michael.hudson@linaro.org
michael.p.macinnis@gmail.com - already as Michael.P.MacInnis@gmail.com
p@pwaller.net - already as peter.waller@gmail.com
r@oktett.se - already as r@varp.se
sergio@larces.uece.br - already as sergio@correia.cc
